name: Skeletons N' Clowns
description:
Help the Wizard to defeat those invading the enchanted forest.
You will have to face 6 types of enemies, 3 of them skeletons, and 3 clowns, they will try to destroy your forest and come up with strategies to annihilate you. 

So be CAREFUL, if you manage to defeat them, their king "THE SKELETON CLOWN" will appear to destroy you,  be careful he is very fast.

Controls:
- W/A/S/D - To move
- Left click - to shoot
- SPACE to make a dash move.

When you kill a enemy, her can give health if you need, OR NOT. 

This game is a small game, but i hope you enjoy.
You may encounter one or more errors, because I am still learning to program.
I hope you have fun and do not forget if that is the case give me a review and share it with your friends.
